lead_paragraph: Advisers plan to more rigorously prepare him for his next debate with Hillary Clinton, but whether he is open to meticulous preparation is a major concern.

byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY, ASHLEY PARKER and MAGGIE HABERMAN

headline.print_headline: Aides’ Plan: Drill Trump for Round 2
headline.main: New Debate Strategy for Donald Trump: Practice, Practice, Practice

snippet: Advisers plan to more rigorously prepare him for his next debate with Hillary Clinton, but whether he is open to meticulous preparation is a major concern....
abstract: Advisers to Donald Trump say that they intend to prepare him more vigorously for next presidential debate against Hillary Clinton, following lackluster performance in first one; many are concerned whether Trump is open to practicing more meticulously, as he seemed to prefer conversations with his advisers over more traditional debate preparation.
